name: Kubernetes Actions: Attach to Pod
description: Alerts when Kubernetes API receives request to attach to a container
rationale: 'pods/attach' is non-standard approach for interacting with containers. Attackers with permissions could execute malicious code and compromise resources within a cluster
remediation: Restrict RBAC access to the 'pods/attach' resource according to the Principle of Least Privilege. Limit such usage only to development, testing or debugging (non-production) activities
